text: Wehlisela phansi amanzi (imvula) evela esibhakabhakeni igeleza ezihosheni ngendlela eyithanda ngayo, izikhukhula ziwasuse amagwebu akhukhumalayo futhi nakulokho abakuncibilikisayo emlilweni ukuze kwakhiwe okokuhloba nomaizitsha, kuveleigwebuelifananako, kanjalouMvelinqangi uliveza (ngezibonelo) iqiniso kanye namanga ngakho-ke amagwebu ayadlula njengento engeyilutho bese kuthi lokho okuwusizo kubantu kuyasala emhlabeni uMvelinqangi wenza kanjalo-ke izibonelo
